physical_examinations.vital_signs: TSH: 234 mU/liter; free T4: 0.27 ng/dl (3.5 pmol/liter)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Large posterior fontanel; mild axial hypotonia; clinical goiter present by day 14.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At 5 years of age, the patient was still receiving hormone replacement therapy and had no goiter.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Thyroid scintigraphy showed no radioactive iodide uptake (0%) at 6 and 24 hours.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Thyroid size returned to normal during hormone replacement therapy.
